'''''The Map of Tolkien's Middle-earth''''' is a [[1995]] map-book by [[Brian Sibley]] and [[John Howe]], covering [[Middle-earth]].

==From the publisher==
{{blockquote|Written by Brian Sibley, this slipcase features Tolkien's maps of "The Hobbit", Beleriand and Middle-earth. The maps, presented with individual books and wallets show Tolkien's mythical lands in detail - they are also bound with fewer folds, making them suitable for portfolios or framing.}}

==See also==
* ''[[The Road Goes Ever On and On: The Map of Tolkien's Middle-earth]]''
